name: ClickFred
description:
A full service digital marketing agency, offering innovative solutions to clients that provide immediate and long term value through technology, analytics & business process automation. The ClickFred team gets involved with your business. We identify internal issues, conduct specific market analysis and provide the best strategic business plans and practical solutions tailored to your day to day operations.
The ClickFred Agency is results driven, we focus on the core facts and metrics that matter, increasing revenue & productivity and reducing operational overhead.
